en.title: Cat Litter Box Cleaning Frequency and Methods: Maintaining Health Through a Clean Litter Box
en.content:
Cats are fastidiously clean animals. If the litter box is dirty, they may refuse to use it or start eliminating in inappropriate places.

Cleaning Frequency

Ideally, clumps should be removed at least twice a day. A complete litter change should be done once or twice a month, and a thorough wash of the litter box itself should be done once a month.

Number of Litter Boxes

The recommended number is the number of cats plus one. For one cat, have two boxes; for two cats, have three. Place them in quiet locations that are easily accessible to your cats.

Odor Control

Regular cleaning is the best odor control strategy. Choosing a cat litter with strong deodorizing properties, ventilating the area around the litter box, and using a pet-specific deodorizing spray are also effective measures.

zh.title: 猫砂盆清洁频率与方法：保持清洁的猫厕所维护猫咪健康
zh.content:
猫咪是非常爱干净的动物，如果猫砂盆脏了，它们可能会拒绝使用，甚至在其他地方随地排泄。

清洁频率

每天至少清理结块部分2次为理想。猫砂全部更换每月1~2次，猫砂盆本体的彻底清洗每月1次为宜。

猫砂盆的数量

推荐数量为"猫的数量+1个"。1只猫准备2个，2只猫准备3个。放置在安静且猫咪容易去到的地方。

除臭对策

勤清理是最好的除臭方法。选择除臭效果好的猫砂、保持猫砂盆周围通风、使用宠物专用除臭喷雾也很有效。
